name: Biker
quote: "It's called a 'Hog', dork, not a pig!"
abilities: When you play the Biker, look through the discard pile for a 'Weapon' and give it to him. This does not count against his Prop limit for the turn.
title: Master

name: Call Girl
quote: "I'm going to have to charge you extra for THAT!"
abilities: On your turn, you may take a card at random from one player who has at least one 'Male' Character in play.
title: Gruesome

name: Camp Councilor
quote: "Why does the job application ask for next of kin so many times?"
abilities: Choose a gender when played. Defense = 6 while at "Camp Lake Zirconia". Gains +1 DS for each 'Young' Character in the same Movie.
title: Sorcery

name: Cowardly Dude
quote: "Well that's just great! What are we gonna do now, man? What are we gonna do now!"
abilities: Cowardly Dude may be played into an opponent's Movie. If he is your only Character in your first deal, discard your hand and draw a new one.
title: Violence

name: FBI Agent
quote: "Stop lying to me kid. Do you think 'FBI' stands for Federal Bureau of Idiots?"
abilities: Gains double the printed bonus from 'Gun' Props. This card should be treated as a "Cop" by any card that mentions "Cops".
title: Terror

name: Funny Guy Who Gets It In The Final Reel
quote: "I can't believe we made it out alive... GAK!"
abilities: "As soon as the Credits are Rolled, you must discard the Funny Guy. His DS does not count towards your score, but his title word does if it matches."
title: Sorority

name: Good Looking Handyman
quote: "So, you're renting the old Winslow place... I just hate cleanin' blood off the walls."
abilities: Gains double the printed bonus from Props as long as they don't have the Trait 'Weapon'.
title: Tunnel

name: Helpful Guy From Next Door
quote: "I heard some funny noises, so I thought I'd see if you were okay... GUG!... ACK... GURGLE"
abilities: 'Psycho Killers' are the only Creatures that can kill the Helpful Guy.
title: Witchcraft

name: Hitch Hiker
quote: "Come on, let's pick him up. What could it hurt?"
abilities: May be played as a 'Psycho Killer' Attack with 10 AS against any Movie that has at least one 'Vehicle' in it.
title: Fearsome

name: Hot Headed Secretary
quote: "Nobody eats my boss' brain without an appointment!"
abilities: While she is in your Movie, YOU get to choose, obeying restrictions, which character dies when your Movie is attacked by another player.
title: Unknown

name: Hunchback Assistant
quote: "Mathter, I got this brain from Abby thomeone... Abby Normal."
abilities: Hunchback may be played as a 'Psycho Killer' with an AS of 7. This card may be played as a Special Effect to make any Attack involving the "Mad Scientist" succeed.
title: Claws

name: Medical Student
quote: "I used to play doctor as a kid. Now that I'm a doctor, I play god."
abilities: Gets triple the printed DS from the "First Aid Kit" and the "Science Text Books".
title: Surgeon

name: Mortician
quote: "Let's book you for a custom fitting, shall we?"
abilities: May be played as a 'Psycho Killer' Attack with an AS = 3 + the number of Characters in the discard pile.
title: Zero

name: Parapsychologist
quote: "It takes an artist to make a deal with the devil!"
abilities: Defense = 5 vs. 'Supernatural' Attacks.
title: Pact

name: Redneck Pump Jockey
quote: "I reckon yer fan belt's shot. Guess you'll hafta stick around a few days…"
abilities: Gains triple the bonus from the "Old Pickup Truck" and double the bonus from the "Shotgun".
title: Massacre

name: Security Guard
quote: "Um... Zombies aren't in the training manual. I think I should call for back up."
abilities: 'Zombie' Attacks must kill the Security Guard before any other Character in the same Movie.
title: Revenge

name: Starship Commander
quote: "Captain, that was amazing!" "Sometimes I amaze even myself."
abilities: Defense = 8 while onboard the "Interplanetary Vessel".
title: Quadrant

name: Store Clerk
quote: "Who wants some?"
abilities: The Store Clerk cannot be killed by 'Zombie' Attacks.
title: Army

name: Survivalist
quote: "Looks like you broke into the wrong gall-durned rec room!"
abilities: Once, on your turn, you may discard 2 cards to search the draw pile, give the Survivalist the first 'Gun' you find, then reshuffle the deck.
title: Return

name: The Best Friend
quote: "We do everything together." "EVERYTHING?"
abilities: When The Best Friend is killed, you may immediately take up to 3 cards from the hand of the player who killed her.
title: Dead

name: Town Drunk
quote: "Hey mithter, buy a guy a drink... say is tat a thentacle?"
abilities: 'Alien' Attacks must kill the Town Drunk before any other Character in the same Movie.
title: Heart

name: Town Sheriff
quote: "When it comes to the law 'round here son, there's me an' there's God. Now who are you more scared of?"
abilities: Gains quadruple the bonus from the "Shotgun".
title: Blood

name: Well Intentioned Scientist
quote: "I never thought my invention would be used for such an evil purpose…"
abilities: May not use 'Weapon' Props.
title: Eternity

name: Albino Alligators
quote: “People, never flush your pets!”
abilities: Albino Alligators always succeed in the Sewer.
title: Sewer

name: Bug-Eyed Monsters
quote: “Well the thumb’s an electronic sub-ether signaling device, the round-about is at Barnard’s Star…” “And the bug-eyed monster?” “...is green, yes.”
abilities: If the Bug-eyed Monsters succeed, instead of putting them in the discard pile you must give them to the player on your right.
title: Zombie

name: Crabmen
quote: “Why do you have to be so shellfish?”
title: Cauldron

name: Disembodied Brain
quote: “You shall kneel before me… as soon as I get out of this damned jar!”
abilities: Gains +2 AS for each ‘Smart’ Character in the target Movie.
title: Suburb

name: Ghost Ship
quote: “Wanna go see ‘There’s Something About the Mary Celeste?’”
abilities: Gains +2 AS for every ‘Supernatural’ Creature you discard from your hand when you declare your attack with the Ghost Ship.
title: Hell

name: Giant Android
quote: "Ooooooo! Shiny!"
abilities: Automatically succeeds when attacking a Movie that stars the "Military Officer".
title: Abyss

name: Hell Hounds
quote: “Children of the night… Shut up!”
abilities: May be used as a Special Effect to triple any other ‘Vampire’ Attack.
title: Time

name: Humanoids From the Deep
quote: “Shouldn’t there be tentacles?”
abilities: Gains +1 AS for every ‘Female’ Character in the Movie they are attacking.
title: Ocean

name: It's Alive... Alive!
quote: "I swear you'd lose your head if it wasn't bolted on!"
abilities: Automatically succeeds in the "Laboratory".
title: Rage

name: Killer Klown
quote: “Watcha gonna do with those pies?
abilities: May use ‘Weapons’ to increase AS. Always succeeds at the “Funhouse”. The Attacker can make them ‘Alien’ at any time.
title: Cult

name: Killer Vegetables
quote: “I thought vegetarians were wusses, and now I have to become one in order to stay at the top of the food chain…”
abilities: When you play this card you may choose to make it ‘Supernatural’ or ‘Alien’ or both.
title: Void

name: Poison Fog
quote: "Get a load of this fresh country air... GURGLE! GAK!"
abilities: Attacker may may it 'Supernatural' at any time. Automatically succeeds at the "Military Installation" as long as it isn't 'Supernatural'. May be played as a Special Effect to triple a 'Supernatural' Attack.
title: Pain

name: Reanimated Pets
quote: "What would the note say, 'Cat dead, details later'?"
abilities: Cannot attack a movie starting any "Skippy” Character.
title: Cheerleader

name: Satanic Cultists
quote: “Natas liah lla”
abilities: May use ‘Weapons’ to boost AS.
title: Horror

name: Skippy the Undead Wonder Dog
quote: “What’s that, Skippy? You ate Billy’s torso?”
abilities: Any “Skippy” Characters in the target Movie have 0 DS during this Attack.
title: Creep

name: Space Plants
quote: “What the #$%@’s a triffid?”
title: Corruption

name: Space Predator
quote: "Metal skin, acid for blood, no remorse... reminds me of my lawyer."
abilities: The printed DS of any Killed by the Predator is banked to your score, and the Character is set aside from the discard pile. Nothing but the "Prologue" card can bring them back into play.
title: Planet

name: Space Vampires
quote: “In space, no one can hear you bleed.”
abilities: Automatically succeeds on the “Interplanetary Vessel”.
title: Escape

name: Supreme Galactic Ruler
quote: “I come from a long line of despots who can’t seem to conquer this planet, even though we have the technology to turn it to dust… BUT I’M DIFFERENT!”
abilities: May be played as a Special Effect to triple the strength of one ‘Alien’ Attack.
title: Phantom

name: Telekinetic Children
quote: “Every time I asked the kid where his folks were he just smiled and pointed to the big pot on the stove.”
abilities: Gains +3 AS for each ‘Young’ Character in the Movie it is attacking.
title: Crypt

name: Vampire Beach Babes
quote: "Gotta love a girl with an oral fixation…"
abilities: The Beach Babes always succeed on "The Beach".
title: Bride

name: ...On the Moors
quote: “Stick to the road… and stay off the moors!”
abilities: ...On the Moors may only be added to an existing Location. “I Was A Teenage Werewolf” always succeeds ...On the Moors.
title: Mausoleum

name: Caves Outside of Town
quote: “What are you worried about?” “Cave-ins, getting lost, rabid bats, atomic monsters… need I go on?”
abilities: On your turn you may give 6 cards from your hand to another player in exchange for taking any Character (plus all attached cards) from their Movie and adding it to yours.
title: Murder

name: College Campus
quote: “It’s not the Student Body that bothers me… It’s all of the student bodies.”
abilities: Can be combined with the “Sorority House”. DS = +6 if you have any of the following in play: “Co-Ed Science Major”, “Medical Student”, “Anthropology Professor”, or “Nymphomaniac Cheerleader”.
title: Corpse

name: Department Store
quote: “Attention Zombie shoppers…”
abilities: On your turn, you may take one Prop out of the discard pile and put it into play in your Movie. May be combined with “The Mall”.
title: Evil

name: Interplanetary Vessel
quote: “Have you sent a distress call?” “Yeah. With any luck, Earth will hear it and sent help in 15 to 20 YEARS!”
abilities: Defense = -5 vs. ‘Alien’ Attacks.
title: Worm

name: Just Over That Hill
quote: “I’m telling you, that meteor landed just over there!”
abilities: Defense = -5 vs. ‘Alien’ Attacks.
title: Trail

name: Military Installation
quote: “Area 51, Warehouse 23...it’s like conspiracy bingo.”
abilities: May be combined with the “Laboratory”. “Military Officer” gains +3 DS while in the Military Installation.
title: Mouth

name: Morgue
quote: “The folks around here seem pretty stiff at first, but once you get to know them, they’re pretty cool.”
abilities: 'Zombie’ Attacks always succeed in the Morgue. May be combined with “The Hospital”
title: X

name: Observatory
quote: “Professor, every time I look through the telescope that one star seems to be getting closer. That’s not right, is it?”
abilities: Defense = +8 vs ‘Alien’ Attacks.
title: Motel

name: Sewer
quote: “What is that smell? … Oh wait, it’s me.”
abilities: “Crocodiles” always succeed in the Sewer.
title: Teenage

name: Subway Tunnel
quote: “It’s the last train to CHUDsville.”
abilities: “Subterranean Cannibals” always succeed in the Subway Tunnel.
title: Foul

name: Swamp Hut
quote: “Relax, nobody knows about this place.” “Then doesn’t that mean nobody knows where we are?”
abilities: 'Aquatic’ Attacks always succeed in the Swamp Hut.
title: Professor

name: The Beach
quote: “Hmmm… Blood Beach… Blood Beach… Nope, can’t find this on the map.”
abilities: Defense = -5 vs. ‘Aquatic’ Attacks. All ‘Young’ Characters at The Beach gain +1 DS.
title: Humanoid

name: The Bermuda Triangle
quote: “Well, it’s more of a rhomboid, actually.”
abilities: No Movie set in the Bermuda Triangle can have any ‘Vehicles’ in it. If there are any in the target Movie where the Bermuda Triangle is played, they must be discarded.
title: Madness

name: The Hospital
quote: “Dr. Feelgood to reception. Calling Dr. Feelgood.”
abilities: Defense = +10 if you have the “Medical Student” in play. Discard 3 cards from your hand to save one of your Characters from being killed.
title: Teeth

name: The Mall
quote: “Does this brain make me look fat?”
abilities: 'Zombie’ Attacks always succeed in The Mall.
title: Undead

name: The Woods
quote: “Oh god! We’re on the nature trail to Hell!”
title: Morgue

name: Alien Artifact
quote: “What do you think it does?”
abilities: Discard to stop one ‘Alien’ Attack.
title: Mask

name: Baseball Bat
quote: “I feel better when I have a hard piece of wood in my hand.”
title: Spirit

name: Canister of Mysterious Goo
quote: “What’s in there?” “You really don’t want to know.”
abilities: Anytime, except during an attack, you can discard the Canister from play to make a 10 AS ‘Alien’ ‘Monster’ Attack.
title: Moon

name: Death Ray
quote: “Whoever designed this sure left nothing to the imagination…”
abilities: Defense = +6 vs. ‘Alien’ attacks.
title: Mountain

name: Drill
quote: “What is it with Psychos and power tools?”
abilities: When played with a ‘Psycho Killer’ Attack, Drill gives +6 AS.
title: Power

name: Flaming Torch
quote: “Fire baaaaad!”
abilities: Discard to stop one ‘Zombie’ or ‘Vampire’ Attack made against your movie. Defense = +5 if in the same Movie as the “Pitchfork”.
title: Black

name: Handcuffs
quote: “Oooo… kinky.”
abilities: Defense = +4 for any “Cop” character or the “Call Girl”.
title: Creature

name: M-16
quote: “It’s swell. It’s M’tel.”
abilities: Defense = +12 for the “Military Officer” or any other Character in the “Military Installation”.
title: Skull

name: Motorcycle
quote: “Loud pipes save lives baby, and right now they’re about to save mine!”
abilities: Discard the Motorcycle from play to save one of your Characters from being killed by a Creature Attack.
title: Came

name: Pitchfork
quote: “Mathter, thereth an angry mob to thee you…”
abilities: You may make it a ‘Weapon’ at any time.
title: Count

name: Recreational Vehicle
quote: “It may not be fast, but you should see the way it crushes zombies.”
abilities: Discard the RV to stop one ‘Zombie’ Attack made against your Movie.
title: Monster

name: Scalpel
quote: “It slices, it dices.”
abilities: Defense = +5 for the “Medical Student”. You can play Scalpel as a Special Effect to add +5 AS to any ‘Psycho Killer’ Attack.
title: Star

name: Science Text Books
quote: “You’d be amazed at what you can make with the things under your sink.”
abilities: Defense = +3 when in the hands of a ‘Smart’ Character.
title: Mansion

name: Sharp Stake
quote: “Now me, I like my stake bloody.”
abilities: Discard from play to stop a ‘Vampire’ Attack made against your Movie.
title: Coffin

name: Tank
quote: “You say you got this at Wall-mart?”
abilities: Defense = +0 vs. ‘Alien’ Attacks.
title: Flames

name: Roll The Credits
quote: KA-BOOM!!! “Explosives make it all better.”
title: Haunting

name: Roll The Credits
quote: “Everybody else is dead, so I guess it’s over.”
title: Nightmare

name: Amphibious
quote: “Kiss it on the snout. Maybe it will turn into a giant, rampaging prince!”
abilities: Double the current AS of one Creature Attack and give it the Trait ‘Aquatic’, the Creature may still attack non-’Aquatic’ locations.
title: Klown

name: Ancient Indian Burial Grounds
quote: “What do you mean you didn’t move the bodies?”
abilities: Anytime, except during an attack, you can play this card as a ‘Supernatural’ ‘Zombie’ Attack. If there is a Location at the attack discard it. AS = the number of Characters in the discard pile.
title: Peculiar

name: Big Budget
quote: “Won’t your dad mind us using his gold card?” “Nah, I’ll give him Executive Producer credit.”
abilities: Your hand size is increased by one for the remainder of the game.
title: Halloween

name: Billy’s Stuff
quote: “Last time I saw Billy he had that with him….” “Last time I saw Billy he didn’t need it anymore.”
abilities: When one of your Characters is killed, instead of discarding all their Props, you may immediately transfer them to your other Characters, ignoring the rules on Prop limits.
title: Warlock

name: Boom in Frame
quote: “You put that microphone in my shot one more time and we’ll see where I can put it!”
abilities: Stop any one card (except “Roll the Credits”) as it is being played. The card is put into the discard pile with no effect.
title: Exterminator

name: Bride Of…
quote: “C’mon! You two were MADE for each other!”
abilities: Take a Creature out of the discard pile and attack with it at +5 AS.
title: Darkness

name: Creative Differences
quote: “You may be the director, but I’M the producer!”
abilities: Make any two players exchange Movies. After the switch is complete, whoever has the lower DS total immediately gets 5 points added to their final score.
title: Sundown

name: Dead Battery
quote: “Engine’s gone.” “You can fix it though, right?” “No, I mean it’s GONE. As in no longer present.”
abilities: Remove one Prop or any card with the trait ‘Vehicle’, from play. If you remove a ‘Vehicle’ you may immediately bank 3 points.
title: Feast

name: Double Feature Creature Show
quote: “At the late night, double feature picture show…”
abilities: You may combine 2 Creature cards into a single Attack. The Attack has all the Traits and abilities of both Creatures.
title: Skeleton

name: Grim Reefer
quote: “Homicidal maniacs frown on recreational drug use.”
abilities: Kill one Character of your choice.
title: Tale

name: Haunted House
quote: “Get ooooooooooout!”
abilities: Remove one Location from play and kill one Character who was in that Location.
title: Sin

name: Hiding Place
quote: “...so that’s when I crawled into the outhouse… and now you know what that smell is…”
abilities: Stop one Character from getting killed. This may not be used to save a ‘Large’ Character.
title: Babe

name: I’ll Be Right Back
quote: “That’s just what Billy said… 2 hours ago.”
abilities: Kill any one Character as long as they aren’t ‘Smart’.
title: Chopper

name: Inanimate Objects
quote: “Oh great, it’s the ‘Attack of the Vending Machine From Hell!’”
abilities: Anytime, except during an attack, take up to 5 Props from the discard pile and use them as a ‘Supernatural’ Attack. AS = the total DS of those Props. If the attack fails or is stopped, the person you attacked gets to place the Props in his Movie.
title: Attack

name: Increased Body Count
quote: “8 bodies and the credits haven’t even started! I have a good feeling about this one.”
abilities: Place this card next to the draw pile and for the rest of the game it is considered “in play” in all players’ Movies. Players bank a point for each Character they kill. If more than one player helps kill a Character during an attack, only the player who launched the Attack banks the point.
title: Fraternity

name: Last Ditch Effort
quote: “I saw this in a movie once…”
abilities: Add +10 DS vs. any one Attack.
title: Portal

name: Life Raft
quote: “Shark invested waters or a cannibal infested life boar… not much of an option.”
abilities: Add +5 DS vs. any one Attack OR stop one ‘Aquatic’ Attack.
title: Hunter

name: Maniac
quote: “He was a quiet man. Kept to himself mostly…”
abilities: Anytime, except during an attack, take any Character in play and use it to make a ‘Psycho Killer’ Attack, AS = triple its printed DS. The Character used is discarded at the end of the attack regardless of the outcome.
title: Chainsaw

name: Meanwhile Back at the…
quote: “Didn’t we pass a castle back down the road a few miles?”
abilities: Take any Location from the discard pile and put it into anyone’s Movie.
title: Castle

name: Meteor Shower
quote: “Look a shooting star. Make a wish.” “Okay, I wish not to die…”
abilities: Double the current AS of one ‘Alien’ Attack.
title: Alien

name: Movie Memorabilia
quote: “It’s a diode from Gort, the robot. It only cost me $5200 on ebay!” “Dude, Gort was just a guy in a silver suit.”
abilities: Play this card after the credits have been rolled. The printed DS of all your Props score double the normal points.
title: Story

name: No Time For Love
quote: “Hey baby, how you doin’?”
abilities: Pick a ‘Male’ and a ‘Female’ Character from any one Movie. They are both removed from play and put in the discard pile.
title: Witch

name: Playing Dead
quote: “Look, it’s ketchup, see? Jeez, some people can’t take a joke.”
abilities: Take a Character out of the discard pile and put it directly into your Movie.
title: Deformed

name: Props Department
quote: “Now try not to break this one.”
abilities: Give each of your Characters a Prop from the discard pile OR remove ALL Props from play.
title: Psycho

name: Ran Upstairs
quote: “There’s no exit on the roof, dumbass!”
abilities: Kill any one ‘Dumb’ Character from any Movie.
title: Man

name: Reload
quote: “We need bigger guns.”
abilities: Take any ‘Gun’ out of the discard pile and put it into play OR stop one Attack made against your Movie if you have a ‘Gun’ in play.
title: Cavern

name: Respect Your Elders
quote: “You kids have it easy! In my day we had to run 10 miles through snow to escape from flesh-eating zombies!”
abilities: Add +5 DS vs. any one Attack OR stop one Attack if you have an ‘Old’ Character in play.
title: Killer

name: Risen From the Grave
quote: “My god! You’re a vampire!” “I prefer the term ‘living impaired.’”
abilities: Anytime, except during an attack, take a Character from the discard pile and use it as a ‘Supernatural’ ‘Vampire’ Attack. AS = triple the printed DS of the Character.
title: Starship

name: Roosters
quote: “Roosters? In the middle of Burbank?” “Poetic license.”
abilities: Add +5 DS vs. any one Attack OR stop one ‘Vampire’ Attack.
title: Wicked

name: Seduction
quote: “Hi there, big boy.”
abilities: Double the current AS of an Attack that doesn’t have the ‘Monster’ Trait. If successful, the Attack must kill off a ‘Male’ Charscter.
title: Beneath

name: Set a Perimeter
quote: “What do you mean ‘set a perimeter’? I’m not going out there. YOU set a perimeter!”
abilities: Add +3 AS vs. any one Attack, OR stop one Attack if you have the “Military Officer”, “Military Installation”, or any “Cop” Character in play.
title: Space

name: Shower Scene
quote: “Hey Billy, is that you? Hand me a towel, will ya?”
abilities: Add +3 AS to any Attack OR double the AS of one ‘Psycho Killer’ Attack.
title: House

name: Slow Paced
quote: “It’s half over and nobody’s dead yet. What a rip off!”
abilities: Every player draws 2 cards starting with the player who played this card and going clockwise. If any of your opponents have more than 6 cards after drawing they must discard down to 6.
title: Abomination

name: So Much Blood
quote: “Blood on the walls, blood on the ceiling, blood on the furniture… what is this, ‘Decor By Manson’?”
abilities: Triple the AS of the current Attack.
title: Town

name: Stumble, Stumble, Fall
quote: “Looks like stiletto heels were the wrong choice for a walk through the woods.”
abilities: Kill any one ‘Female’ Character from any Movie OR double the AS of one ‘Psycho Killer’ Attack.
title: Beware

name: Take Two
quote: “Okay people, one more time.”
abilities: Force an Attack just resolved to be immediately replayed. Any Special Effects used the first time are still in the discard pile.
title: Satan

name: That’s Some Story, Kid
quote: “Goway kid, you bother me.”
abilities: Add +5 AS to any Attack OR halve the DS of a Movie (round down) for the duration of the current Attack, if that Movie has a ‘Young’ Character in it.
title: Chick

name: Tickets Please
quote: “What are we seeing?” “Naughty Nymphos from Neptune.” “NICE!”
abilities: Take up to two cards at random from each of your opponents. The “Documentary Cameraman” cannot use his abilities to retrieve this card.
title: Soul

name: Underground Monsters
quote: “They’re under the ground. They’re under the gall-durned ground!”
abilities: Add +2 AS to any Attack OR double the Strength of one ‘Monster’ Attack.
title: Man-Eating

name: Weak Heart
quote: “Ack! Gah! Gurgle… THUD!”
abilities: Kill any one ‘Old’ Character from any Movie.
title: Capture

name: Working Title
quote: “How can it be the same movie if my character’s gone from being an ex-priest turned police detective to an Eskimo seal hunter?”
abilities: You may take any 6 cards from the discard pile and use them to make a new title for the current game and then shuffle them back into the draw pile.
title: Dread

name: Zero Gravity
quote: “Cool… I feel all floaty…”
abilities: Place this card next to the draw pile and for the rest of the game it is considered “in play” in all players’ Movies. All ‘Alien” Attacks made for the remainder of the game are made at double strength.
title: Nebula
